mapper.select: SELECT cr.*, u.username, u.avatar FROM course_review cr LEFT JOIN user u ON cr.user_id = u.id WHERE cr.course_id = #{courseId} AND cr.status = 1 ORDER BY cr.created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO course_review (course_id, user_id, rating, content, status, created_at) VALUES (#{courseId}, #{userId}, #{rating}, #{content}, #{status}, #{createdAt})
